weka.core.pmml

Class PMMLFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.core.pmml.PMMLFactory

  • public class PMMLFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a factory class for reading/writing PMML models

    $Revision: 5562 $
    Author:
